titleInfo.title: GROSSMAN et al v. MERRILL LYNCH&CO., INC. et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER THAT DEFENDANTS' MOTIONS TO DISMISS COUNT I OF THE COMPLAINT ARE DENIED; DEFENDANTS' MOTIONS TO DISMISS COUNT II OF THE COMPLAINT ARE DENIED; DEFENDANTS' MOTIONS TO DISMISS COUNT III OF THE COMPLAINT ARE DENIED AS THEY PERTAIN TO PURCHASES ON OR SUBSEQUENT TO 7/19/01, AND GRANTED AS THEY PERTAIN TO SECURITIES PURCHASED PRIOR TO 7/19/01; DEFENDANTS' MOTIONS TO DISMISS COUNT IV OF THE COMPLAINT ARE DENIED; DEFENDANTS' MOTIONS TO DISMISS COUNT V OF THE COMPLAINT ARE DENIED; AND DEFENDANTS' MOTION TO DISMISS COUNTS VI IS GRANTED. THE CLERK OF COURT IS HEREBY DIRECTED TO TERMINATE THE PENDING MOTIONS TO DISMISS IN THIS MATTER.SIGNED BY JUDGE LEGROME D. DAVIS ON 5/31/05. 5/31/05 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED AND E-MAILED.(cdd, ) Modified on 5/31/2005 (cdd, ).

titleInfo.title: GROSSMAN et al v. MERRILL LYNCH&CO., INC. et al
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER THAT LEAD PLAINTIFFS' MOTION FOR CLASS CERTIFICATION IS GRANTED. THIS ACTION IS CERTIFIED AS A CLASS ACTION PURSUANT TO FRCP 23(A) AND 23(B)(3). PLAINTIFFS CEDAR STREET FUND, CEDAR STREET OFFSHORE FUND AND KENNETH GROSSMAN ARE APPOINTED AS CLASS REPRESENTATIVES. KRISLOV&ASSOCIATES AND CHIMICLES&TIKELLIS, LLP ARE APPOINTED AS CLASS COUNSEL AND LIAISON COUNSEL, RESPECTIVELY. SIGNED BY HONORABLE LEGROME D. DAVIS ON 4/29/08. 4/29/08 ENTERED AND COPIES MAILED, E-MAILED.(fdc, )
